summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5762 for the improvement of 1st Avenue North, from Republican Street to Mercer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by the installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 75981, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
